text: Need Brandon Nelson for Priceline campaign. Budget around $2,251, looking for 2 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Twitter post, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x TikTok video, 1 x Instagram story. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
